scripts.deploy: npm run copy && spicetify config extensions private-session.js && spicetify apply && spicetify enable-devtools
scripts.deploy-dist: npm run build && npm run copy-dist && spicetify config extensions private-session.js && spicetify apply
scripts.local: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run deploy
scripts.undeploy-local: rm -rf `spicetify path userdata`/Extensions/private-session.js && spicetify config extensions private-session.js- && spicetify apply
